page.title: 18Teenage life in Carlton
page.content: Mr X Life for Mr X consists of sporting pastimes such as tennis and cricket. At home he reads magazines on BMX and computing. He owns a Sinclair ZX Spectrum and a BMX bike which he rides in the streets near home as there is no BMX track in Carlton.After school he works at West Bank Market Gardens. The rest of his time is spent watching television. Miss Y In the evening and at weekends she does not find Carlton interesting enough, so she visits neighbouring villages. When this is impossible she attends a youth club held at the 'Old School' on Monday and Friday evenings from 7-9pm where there is a pool table and disco room. At home she uses ACR, a link between her and her friends in other villages when she can't visit.
